===Etymology 2===
First written as {{zh-l|獞}} (note the "beast" radical, {{zh-l|犭}}). Following the foundation of the PRC it was written as {{zh-l|僮}} (with a "person" radical, {{zh-l|亻}}). Due to the derogatory connotations of the previous characters, it was officially amended to {{lang|zh|壯}}／{{lang|zh|壮}} ("strong; robust") in 1965.
